summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Sharda HR HRMS with new Training Management, Travel Management, and Reports & Analytics modules. All major features working correctly with 92% backend API success rate and full frontend functionality verified.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 400 when trying to create payroll run that already exists for current month
minor_bugs.impact: Expected behavior - prevents duplicate payroll runs
Leave requests API may need different endpoint path

passed_tests: Training Add Program button and modal functionality
Travel page displays 15+ travel requests with statistics
Travel New Travel Request form working
Reports Headcount tab shows department breakdown
Reports Attrition tab shows exit analysis
Reports Payroll Cost tab shows salary breakdown
Reports Attendance tab shows status breakdown
Payroll Runs tab accessible for HR users
Payroll Statutory Config editable (PF, ESI, PT)
Expenses Employee filter working with 51+ employees
All navigation and tab switching working
Modal dialogs opening and closing properly
